articles.content: U.S. stock-index futures stayed open long enough Friday for traders to get a look at the March jobs report, extending a modest rise after a much stronger-than-expected jump in nonfarm payrolls. Cash … [+2386 chars]

articles.title: U.S. Treasury yields remain slightly higher following robust March jobs report - CNBC
articles.description: U.S. Treasury yields were slightly higher on Friday morning, following a better-than-expected March jobs report.
articles.content:
U.S. Treasury yields were slightly higher on Friday morning, following a better-than-expected March jobs report.
